issue.title: Display ID and GUID in diffusion view
issue.body:
**Original author :** Blatti Yves

A user creates a diffusion but cannot get the id and guid of the diffusion.

We could add them in the second tab of the diffusion view.
Those infos are needed for automatic product mining (external systems).

Proposed layout:

!add_id_and_guid.png!

**Fixed versions :** 4.4.0

comments.body:
**Original author :** Van Hoecke Hélène 

TC has validated those informations in Infos tab.
